original: 劉備納龐統之策，奪取益州，自領益州牧，跨有荊、益。但因未還荊州，孫劉間已生嫌隙，若非畏懼曹操虎視，恐早已交兵。
text: Liu Bei adopts the strategy of Pang's unification, seizes Yizhou, leads Yizhou to herd, and crosses Jing and Yi. But because he had not returned to Jingzhou, Sun Liujian was already in suspicion. If he were not afraid of Cao Cao's eyes, he would have already turned his troops.
